levelList.name: Воющая-Миркалла
levelList.desc:
This unit's HP does not drop below 1 while using this Skill.
Clash Power +1 for every 100 <sprite name="BloodDinner_Accumulation"><color=#9f6a3a><u><link="BloodDinner_Accumulation">Испитое пиршество</link></u></color> by this unit (max 2)
[BeforeAttack] At less than 50 <sprite name="BloodDinner"><color=#9f6a3a><u><link="BloodDinner">Кровавое пиршество</link></u></color>, inflict 1 <sprite name="Laceration"><color=#e30000><u><link="Laceration">Кровотечение</link></u></color> with every Hit
[EndSkill] For 3 turns, lose 10 SP at Turn End.

coindescs.desc: Deal +0.1% more damage for every <sprite name="BloodDinner_Common_Accumulation"><color=#9f6a3a><u><link="BloodDinner_Common_Accumulation">Общеиспитое пиршество</link></u></color> (max 10%)

At 100+ <sprite name="BloodDinner_Common_Accumulation"><color=#9f6a3a><u><link="BloodDinner_Common_Accumulation">Общеиспитое пиршество</link></u></color>: deal +0.1% more damage for every value (max 10%)
